title: Numerical Solution of CVODEs
text:
Learning Outcomes
After completing this computational methods appendix you should be able to…

Identify a set of CVODEs,
Know what you must provide to a CVODE solver and what it will return,
Specify…,
Specify the algorithm steps for using a CVODE solver, and
Solve a set of CVODEs and display, save, or plot the results using Python or Matlab.

title: Numerical Solution of CVODEs
text:
Reading Assignment
Reaction Engineering Basics, Appendix K.

title: Numerical Solution of CVODEs
text:
Learning Resources

This website is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Non-Commercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License (CC BY-NC-ND 4.0).

title: Numerical Solution of ATEs
text:
Learning Outcomes
After completing this computational methods appendix you should be able to…

Identify a set of ATEs,
Know what you must provide to an ATE solver and what it will return,
Specify an initial guess to pass to an ATE solver,
Specify a residuals function to pass to an ATE solver,
Specify the algorithm steps for using an ATE solver, and
Solve a set of ATEs and display, save, or plot the results using Python or Matlab.

title: Numerical Solution of ATEs
text:
Reading Assignment
Reaction Engineering Basics, Appendix I.

title: Numerical Solution of ATEs
text:
Learning Resources

title: SCoRE
text:
Make sure there is a PFR kinetics assignment that uses the volume as the dependent variable.
Compare linear least squares, non-linear least squares using absolute errors, and non-linear least squares using relative errors.

Click Here to See the Evolving Solution



Content is being added to SCoRE in parallel with the revision of the first draft of Reaction Engineering Basics. I hope to complete both by the end of 2025.

title: Numerical Solution of IVODEs
text:
Learning Outcomes
After completing this computational methods appendix you should be able to…

Identify a set of IVODEs,
Know what you must provide to an IVODE solver and what it will return,
Specify initial values and a stopping criterion to pass to an IVODE solver,
Specify a derivatives function to pass to an IVODE solver,
Specify the algorithm steps for using an IVODE solver, and
Solve a set of IVODEs and display, save, or plot the results using Python or Matlab.

title: Numerical Solution of IVODEs
text:
Reading Assignment
Reaction Engineering Basics, Appendix J.

title: Numerical Solution of BVODEs
text:
Learning Outcomes
After completing this computational methods appendix you should be able to…

Identify a set of BVODEs,
Know what you must provide to a BVODE solver and what it will return,
Specify a derivatives function to pass to a BVODE solver,
Specify a boundary conditions residuals function to pass to a BVODE solver,
Specify the algorithm steps for using a BVODE solver, and
Solve a set of BVODEs and display, save, or plot the results using Python or Matlab.

title: Numerical Solution of BVODEs
text:

Reaction Engineering Basics, Appendix M.
